ygData.subject: If you thought tinkering was dead before...
ygData.msgSnippet: This latest patch just made the mages 1-charge water breathing stones non-lore. I already had a heck of a time selling my aqualungs/rebreathers. Now any 50 lev
ygData.messageBody:
This latest patch just made the mages 1-charge water
breathing stones non-lore. I already had a heck of a time
selling my aqualungs/rebreathers. Now any 50 lev can
walk into unrest and offer 20pp for a backpack full of stones
to any 20th level mage.

In addition, with Kunark coming out -- Kedge will get less and
less traffic. I hope there's an underwater zone or two in Kunark.

Igbot Anklestabber
Retired Tinkerer (until maybe they add somethign some day)
